miml.data

Class MLSave

  • java.lang.Object
    • miml.data.MLSave

  • public final class MLSave
extends java.lang.Object
    Class with methods to write to file a multi-label dataset. MIML format is also supported.
    Version:
    20161122
    Author:
    F.J. Gonzalez, Eva Gibaja
